Docs.summary: Gets the location in terms of path, line and column.
Docs.returns:
that contains path, line and column information.
Returns an invalid span (see ) if the information is not available.
The values are not affected by line mapping directives (#line in C# or #ExternalSource in VB).

Docs.summary: Returns the metadata module the location is associated with or null if the module is not available.
Docs.remarks: Might return null even if returns true. The module symbol might not be available anymore, for example, if the location is serialized and deserialized.
